bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of numbness together with cramps. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 7: 石斛酒，治風虛氣滿，脚痛 痹攣，弱不能行方 , “Wine with shi hu , a recipe to cure wind [intruding into a state of] depletion and qi fullness, with pain and blockage cramps affecting one’s legs, and resulting in weakness and an inability to move”. However, in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 this term is documented only as a result of what may be a copying error: Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 百病主治藥 quoting Yao xing lun 藥性論 Ma bo zhu zhi 麻勃主治：一百二十 種惡風，黑色遍身苦癢 , “120 types of malign wind, the entire body assumes a dark complexion and suffers from itching”, writes: 麻勃，一百二十種惡風， 黑色遍身苦痹攣 , “ Ma bo , [It cures] 120 types of malign wind, the entire body assumes a dark complexion with blockage cramps ”.
